text: Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, kangaete mita no ka, watashi ga omo kara no akashi no ue ni tachi, kare wa watashi ni, shitashiku jihi o atae rareru no ni, moshi watashi ga kare ni shitagawanainaraba, dare ga arra  (no ikari) kara watashi o kyujo suru koto ga dekiyou ka. Anata gata wa watashi o motto hametsu shite shi mau dakedearu
